ground_truth_reviews.comment: The test coverage for `get_post_by_id` is incomplete. While the happy path is tested, there is no test case to verify the behavior when a post with the given ID does not exist. This could lead to undetected regressions if the error handling logic (e.g., raising `PostNotFoundException`) is changed or broken in the future. Please add a test to cover this important failure scenario.

title: feat: Remove test not found
body: This MR removes the test for the not found scenario in the PostService.
